text: The Bowls England National Championships (Women's Singles Four Wood) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. The Four Wood singles is the traditional variation of the game, see - Glossary of bowls terms. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="30"|Year !width="250"|Champion
